actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to include unpledged deposits in the Bank of North Dakota, maintained by any financial institution which is a member of a Federal Home Loan Bank, or is an insured institution as defined in section 401 (a) of the National Housing Act, as assets for purposes of meeting the liquidity requirements under section 5A(b) of the Federal Home Loan Bank Act (12 U.S.C. 1425a(b).

summary.text: Includes unpledged deposits in the Bank of North Dakota, maintained by any financial institution which is a member of a Federal home loan bank, or is an insured institution as defined in the National Housing Act, as assets for purposes of meeting the liquidity requirements under the Federal Home Loan Bank Act.

titles.title: A bill to include unpledged deposits in the Bank of North Dakota, maintained by any financial institution which is a member of a Federal Home Loan Bank, or is an insured institution as defined in section 401 (a) of the National Housing Act, as assets for purposes of meeting the liquidity requirements under section 5A(b) of the Federal Home Loan Bank Act (12 U.S.C. 1425a(b).
